isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Vibration Damper, Crankshaft, Main Bearings, Flywheel, and Crankcase - Install - Install Rear Oil Seal And Wear Sleeve

svcproc.title: Install Rear Oil Seal And Wear Sleeve

note.para: It is not necessary to remove the flywheel housing if the rear oil seal carrier, oil seal, and wear sleeve are being replaced.

step1.para:
Attach Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer (ZTSE2535C)
with two mounting bolts to crankshaft flange.

figure.caption: Install Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer

step1.para: Place new gasket in rear oil seal carrier. Install rear oil seal carrier on crankcase loosely with mounting bolts.

note.para: If the carrier gasket does not seat on the crankcase, it will leak.

step1.para:
Rotate carrier, as necessary, to align carrier with crankcase rails. Verify proper alignment. Use Bevelled Edge Straightedge (OEM1293)
.
When rear oil seal carrier is level, tighten mounting bolts to " Special Torque ."
Assemble Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer on crankshaft.

figure.caption: Assemble Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer

step1.para: Turn forcing nut, with appropriate sized wrench, on Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer until seal and sleeve are seated in bore.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve

step1.para: Install main oil gallery cup plug, if not already installed. See "Clean Crankcase" in this section.

note.para: Install rear oil seal and wear sleeve as a unit. Do not remove seal from wear sleeve prior to installation.

step1.para: Clean crankshaft flange and seal carrier bore thoroughly. Remove any debris.

Attach Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer (ZTSE2535C)
with two mounting screws to crankshaft flange.

figure.caption: Attach Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer

step1.para: Coat inside diameter of wear sleeve and outside diameter of oil seal with Permatex®.
Position oil seal and wear sleeve over crankshaft.

note.para: Proper use of installer tool will ensure oil seal and wear sleeve are pressed on crankshaft flange to proper depth.

step1.para: Assemble Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer on crankshaft. Turn forcing nut, with appropriate sized wrench, on Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer until seal and sleeve are seated in bore.

figure.caption: Install rear oil seal and wear sleeve

step1.para: Remove Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installer.
Place new pose seal on end of crankshaft. Work pose seal on by moving pose seal in circular direction until pose seal is on completely.
